Verifying Family Expenses
Do not attempt to verify family expenses that have already been allowed.
However, if a claimant reports a change in family expenses for a retroactive period and the change will affect the rate of pension payable, adjust the award, subject to
38 CFR 3.31
and
38 CFR 3.660(b)(1)
, effective the later of the two following dates:
the beginning of theÂ reporting period during which the change occurred, or
the date the hardship exclusion was first allowed on the award.
